snippet: The women on the City Council were attacked in sexist emails and social media posts after they rejected a land-use deal that would have paved the way for a sports arena.
abstract: Seattle City Council's five-woman majority provokes sexist backlash on social media after voting against deal aimed at building new sports arena; male officials' effort to defend council members itself draws fire; issue pits city's liberal ethos against its ardor for sports.
lead_paragraph: The women on the City Council were attacked in sexist emails and social media posts after they rejected a land-use deal that would have paved the way for a sports arena.

headline.main: Majority-Female Council in Seattle Faces Backlash After Sports Arena Vote
headline.print_headline: Majority-Female Council in Seattle Faces Backlash for Rejecting Arena Deal
